theOlympian:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theOlympian:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theOlympian:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theOlympian:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theOlympian:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theOlympian:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theOlympian:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theOlympian:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theOlympian:ZeusAid.NAME: Zeus' Aid
theOlympian:ZeusAid.DESCRIPTION: Retain. At the start of your turn for the next three turns, lightning strikes three random enemies for !M! damage each.

theOlympian:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
theOlympian:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack, lightning strikes one random enemy for 1 damage.

theOlympian:CallLightning.NAME: Call Lightning
theOlympian:CallLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and add 1 [#ffe599]Lighting [#ffe599]Bolt to your discard pile. Exhaust.

theOlympian:FaradayCage.NAME: Faraday Cage
theOlympian:FaradayCage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and apply !M! theolympian:Jolted to yourself.

theOlympian:Electrocute.NAME: Electrocute
theOlympian:Electrocute.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to target's theolympian:Jolted.
theOlympian:Electrocute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dead damage equal to target's theolympian:Jolted +2

theOlympian:OhmicResistance.NAME: Ohmic Resistance
theOlympian:OhmicResistance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If ALL Enemies are theolympian:Jolted , gain !B! more Block.

theOlympian:HeavenlyFuror.NAME: Heavenly Furor
theOlympian:HeavenlyFuror.DESCRIPTION: When your theolympian:Call is played, add !B! [#ffe599]Lightning [#ffe599]Bolts to your hand.

theOlympian:CloudedJudgement.NAME: Clouded Judgement
theOlympian:CloudedJudgement.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When your theolympian:Call is played, gain !M! Block.

theOlympian:LightningRod.NAME: Lightning Rod
theOlympian:LightningRod.DESCRIPTION: Add a [#ffe599]Lightning [#ffe599]Bolt to your hand whenever you block all incoming damage.

theOlympian:CurseOfLykaia.NAME: Curse of Lykaia
theOlympian:CurseOfLykaia.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply 40 theolympian:Jolted to yourself. In two turns, remove all theolympian:Jolted from yourself.

theOlympian:Fulmination.NAME: Fulmination
theOlympian:Fulmination.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Apply !M! theolympian:Jolted to target. At the start of your next turn, add a [#ffe599]Fulmination to your hand.
